thread.title: EPL: Lukaku's equaliser denies Liverpool victory over Everton
thread.title_full: EPL: Lukaku's equaliser denies Liverpool victory over Everton - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: EPL: Lukaku's equaliser denies Liverpool victory over Everton
text:
*Johannesburg:* Romelu Lukaku scored the equalising goal as Everton bounced back to secure a deserved 1-1 draw against Liverpool in the Premier League Merseyside derbies clash on Sunday.*Adam Lallana (R) vies against Everton's Belgian striker Romelu Lukaku. Pic/ AFP*
Danny Ings put Liverpool ahead in the 41st minute before ... Â»
